item.title: PICES annual meeting
item.description: PICES-2018 Annual Meeting Hajoon attended PICES-2018 Annual Meeting in Yokohama, Japan from October 31 to November 2, 2018. He gave a talk titled by “]Data assimilation of physical and chlorophyll-a observations in the California Current System using two biogeochemical models](https://meetings.
